characterDescription:
The cook is presumed to be a Dysian Aimian and one of the siblings of the Sleepless.
She poisons all of the sailors aboard the First Dreams, including Kaza, in order to continue to keep men from discovering Akinah, as the secrets there - according to her - are gravely dangerous.
Her body then breaks down into cremlings as she reveals her true form to the dying Kaza.
